definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: The turning disc is connected by a drive belt to an electric motor.
sentences.chinese: 轉盤由一根傳動帶與電機相連。

sentences.english: Through changes the driving gear and the driven wheel transmission belt's contact radius carries on the speed change.
sentences.chinese: 通過改變驅動輪與從動輪傳動帶的接觸半徑進行變速。

sentences.english: Open Continuously Variable Transmission with plate check and found that serious belt slipping.
sentences.chinese: 打開無級變速傳動帶罩板檢查，發現傳動帶打滑嚴重。

sentences.english: Open Continuously Variable Transmission with plate check and found that serious belt slipping.
sentences.chinese: 打開無級變速傳動帶罩板檢查，發現傳動帶打滑嚴重。

sentences.english: Put your carry-on baggage on the belt, please.
sentences.chinese: 請您把隨身攜帶的行李放在傳動帶上。

sentences.english: The nonlinear vibration of an axially moving viscoelastic belt as typical moving continua was experimentally investigated.
sentences.chinese: 利用實驗方法研究粘彈性傳動帶的非線性振動。

sentences.english: It took firemen two hours to cut through the drive belt to free him.
sentences.chinese: 消防員花了兩個小時才把傳動帶切斷，把他救了出來。

sentences.english: The engine drove the rear wheel via a belt.
sentences.chinese: 發動機通過一條傳動帶拖動後輪。

sentences.english: Conveyor or transmission belts or belting, of vulcanized rubber.
sentences.chinese: 硫化橡膠制的傳動帶或輸送帶及帶料。
